Package gameobjects.ui

Class TowerButton

java.lang.Object
gameobjects.GameObject
gameobjects.ui.Button
gameobjects.ui.TowerButton
public class TowerButton extends Button
A button used in the shop to purchase and place towers, and also to display their info and price. Uses java reflect to create tower objects from their class.
